meeting_info.location: Council Briefing Room, 6th Floor at City Hall, Dallas, Texas; Virtual attendance available

agenda_items.title: Approval of the March 25, 2024 Housing and Homelessness Solutions Committee Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Introduction to the All INside Initiative
agenda_items.description: A United States Interagency Council on Homelessness initiative to reduce unsheltered homelessness.

agenda_items.title: Dallas Housing Policy 2033 (DHP33) Implementation Update
agenda_items.description: Update covering DHP33 Pillars 1-7, the Inclusive Housing Task Force, Neighborhood Revitalization Strategy Areas, Action Plan, and Next Steps.
agenda_items.presenter: Cynthia Rogers-Ellickson, Thor Erickson, Darwin Wade

agenda_items.title: Update on Development Programs
agenda_items.description: New Construction and Substantial Rehabilitation Program, Use of Right-of-Reverter in Land Transfer Program, and Single-Family Homeownership Development Requirements.

agenda_items.title: Department of Housing & Neighborhood Revitalization (HOU) FY 2023-2024 Cumulative Performance Measures
agenda_items.description: Performance measures for HOU programs in Quarters One and Two.

agenda_items.title: Update on 1,000-unit Housing Challenge
agenda_items.description: Transit-Oriented Development sites located at various addresses.

agenda_items.title: Office of Homeless Solutions and the Department of Housing & Neighborhood Revitalization Properties Update
Office of Homeless Solutions - Upcoming Agenda Item
agenda_items.description: Public hearing to receive public comments on the adoption of Substantial Amendment No. 1 to the FY 2023-24 Action Plan for HOME Investment Partnerships Program and American Rescue Plan Act Grant Funds.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item: Notice of Funding Availability (NOFA) Development Project
agenda_items.description: Authorize the City Manager to execute a development loan agreement for the development of Tenison Lofts at Samuell Grand.

agenda_items.title: Upcoming Agenda Item: Authorize the Dallas Public Facility Corporation
agenda_items.description: Acquire, develop, and own Bloc House Santa Fe Trail, and enter into a lease agreement for the development of the Project.

agenda_items.title: Housing and Homelessness Solutions (HHS) Committee Forecast
agenda_items.description: Briefing items to be placed on the HHS Committee agendas for future meetings.

financial_items.description: Funding for the development of Tenison Lofts at Samuell Grand.
financial_items.type: Community Development Block Grant Disaster Recovery Funds

financial_items.description: Reallocation of funds for supportive services in the R.E.A.L Time Re-Housing Program.
